alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Renville; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:13PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Granite Falls HWY 212 affecting Renville, Yellow Medicine and Chippewa Counties. .Widespread flooding continues on area rivers. Additional rainfall from today and into Friday will keep river flows increased. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Granite Falls HWY 212. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 890.0 feet, Flood waters from the diversion begin to affect 11th Ave west of Granite Falls...which cuts off access to the events center. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 815 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 890.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 815 PM CDT Thursday was 890.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 888.1 feet next Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 885.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 888.9 feet on 07/02/2011. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
